decisions.description: The case type specific JSON elements of the outgoing posts to Tekmir will be defined below. Based on Case Type
decisions.name: Case_Type_Specific_Field_Check
decisions.label: Case Type Specific Field Check

decisions.name: CM_Location_Record_Exists_Check
decisions.label: CM Location Record Exists Check
decisions.defaultConnectorLabel: No, CM Record Does Not Exist

Flow.description: 05/19/2025 - Updated mapping for injuredPartyIsLiving from Injured_Party_Is_Living__c fx field to Is_your_loved_one_still_living__c 3/31/25 - added State_Of_Death to the json sent to Tekmir 3/4/2025 - CS - Removed Start Flow log entry AND updated flow to set Is Referral Partner API Error if an error is encountered. 2/26/25 - Changed client State to reference intake.FX_Client_Billing_State__c 1/6/2025 - Pushing CM Location Changes Live, fix to add Start Date 12/22/2024 CS - Fixing / addressing issue with primaryInjuryIsDiagnosed element 12/20/2024 CS - Adding medicalProvider and medicalFacility arrays

formulas.name: executorYesNo
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Intake.Confirm_if_caller_is_next_of_kin__c},"The caller is the formal next of kin (when through all levels and they are the next in line)"),"Yes","No")

formulas.description: Formula to return the inverse value of the 'Before seeing advertising about the lawsuit, did you know there might be a connection between Depo Provera and your tumor? -- (Depo Provera)' (i.e. CM_Advertising_Check__c) to Tekmir / D&C because they ask the question differently
formulas.name: fx_CmAdvertisingCheckInverseValue

formulas.description: IF Date First Learned of is not blank THEN Date First Learned ELSE Discovery Date
formulas.name: fx_DepoDiscoveryOfCauseDate
fx_ExecutorBoolean
formulas.expression: IF(ISPICKVAL({!Get_Intake.Confirm_if_caller_is_next_of_kin__c},"The caller is the formal next of kin (when through all levels and they are the next in line)"),true,false)

formulas.description: Formula - Translates a case specific question into a generic Yes/No text response. I.E. If a Round Up case's Campaign_Case__r.Diagnosis_1__c field = Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma (NHL), then Yes, else No
formulas.name: fx_primaryInjuryIsDiagnosed
formulas.expression: IF( AND( {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} = "Round Up", ISPICKVAL({!Get_Intake.Campaign_Case__r.Diagnosis_1__c}, "Non-Hodgkins Lymphoma (NHL)") ), "Yes", IF( AND( {!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Case_Type__r.Name} = "Depo-Provera", ISPICKVAL({!Get_Intake.Campaign_Case__r.Diagnosis_1__c}, "Meningioma") ), "Yes", "No" ) )
